column4: Hi, I'm having some trouble with my live cd of ubuntu 7.04 that I ordered :(
And it said to ask here ^^
I'm not sure, sorry. How do I find out?
hard to say, do you have access so you can download the image and burn another copy?
I don't think it's the CD, I'd say it's my poor computer. What are the specs for Ubuntu 7.04?
it should run on some really old stuff
hm, do you have a OS installed on the computer now?
Windows XP on partiton one (hda1), Damn Small Linux on part2 (hda2)
if so, maybe boot that one up and note down the hardware and search for known problems
when the gui is supposed to come up, do the screen go blank or do the computer hangs?
It just keeps loading and loading like the RAM or CPU usage is absolutely hammered.
So what do you thinks the problem? :(
no idea, but probably some graphics-setting that isnt working with your hardware, as it works if you start it without gfx
So is there any workaround or anything I can use, like a reduced graphics mode or something not so intensive if my Graphics card cant handle it?
